short_summary: One new Field Row Crop Planter is needed
description: Request for Quotation for Field Row Crop Planter
duration_in_months: Bid submission must be submitted by January 31, 2023
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

**Tender Information**

* **Tender Title:** Field Row Crop Planter
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3756846589
* **Publication Date:** January 10, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 31, 2023, at 14:00 EST

**Amendment to Closing Time**

Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by January 31, 2023 at 14:00 EST. Any bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

**Tender Description**

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) and Portage la Prairie Research and Development Centre (PRDC) require one (1) new Field Row Crop Planter (Semoir en ligne cultures de plein champ) to support their research and development activities. The planter will be used to plant and seed a variety of crops.

The bid solicitation cancels and supersedes the previous bid solicitation number WS3756846589 (Doc3772069608) dated December 7, 2022, with a closing of December 22, 2022, at 14:00 EST. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation.

**Procurement Details**

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (Categorie approvisionnement: biens et services)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding (Methode d'approvisionnement: concurrentielle - invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price (Criteres de selection : le prix le plus bas)
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) (Accords commerciaux : Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC))

**Contracting Entity Information**

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) / Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

**End User Entities**

*
